content_zh:
注意！注意！注意！
 任何游戏通知、合作关系以及团队变动，如未在论坛发布公告，请勿相信！
 如因随意相信他人而造成的游戏资产丢失、亏损以及误操作、甚至与游戏无关的资产损失等请自行承担后果。
content_en:
Notice! Notice! Notice! 
 Any game announcements, partnership and team changes, please don't believe it if you haven't posted an announcement on the forum! 
 Please be responsible for the loss, loss and misoperation of game assets caused by arbitrarily trusting others, or even loss of assets unrelated to the game.
